Literature.Title: A Uniform In Vitro Efficacy Dataset to Guide Antimicrobial Peptide Design.
Literature.Author: Nagarajan D, Nagarajan T, Nanajkar N, Chandra N

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli K12 MG1655(MIC=>128µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii MTCC 9829(MIC=>128µg/ml),Shigella boydii MTCC 11947(MIC=>128µg/ml),Shigella flexneri MTCC 1457(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica MTCC 9844(MIC=>128µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae MTCC 7407(MIC=>128µg/ml),Klebsiella oxytoca MTCC 2275(MIC=>128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 3542(MIC=>128µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris MTCC 1771(MIC=>128µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis MTCC 3158(MIC=>128µg/ml),Citrobacter koseri MTCC 1657(MIC=>128µg/ml),Citrobacter freundii MTCC 1658(MIC=>128µg/ml),Neisseria mucosa MTCC 1772(MBC=>128µg/ml),Vibrio cholerae MTCC 3904(MIC=>128µg/ml),Pluralibacter gergoviae MTCC 3826(MIC=>128µg/ml),Haemophilus influenzae MTCC 621(MIC=>128µg/ml),Alcaligenes faecalis MTCC 1937(MIC=>128µg/ml),Bordetella bronchiseptica MTCC 6837(MIC=>128µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes MTCC 111(MIC=>128µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia MTCC 1890(MIC=>128µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus MTCC 425(MBC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 3160(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus haemolyticus MTCC 3383(MIC=>128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis MTCC 439(MIC=>128µg/ml),Corynebacterium glutamicum MTCC 2679(MIC=>128µg/ml),Corynebacterium pseudotuberculosis MTCC 3158(MBC=>128µg/ml),Alkalihalobacillus alcalophilus MTCC 860(MIC=>128µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MBC=>128µg/ml),Candida albicans MTCC 425(MBC=>128µg/ml)
